meanings.sent1: The movie star wore a dishy outfit to the award show.
meanings.sent2: She thought the new student was very dishy.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked dishy in its tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in dishy hues.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with dishy flowers of all colors.

meanings.sent1: The tabloid magazine always has dishy stories about celebrities.
meanings.sent2: The scandal was so dishy that everyone was talking about it.
meanings.sent3: The dishy rumor spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent4: Her diary was full of dishy secrets that she never wanted anyone to see.
meanings.sent5: The dishy revelation shocked the entire community.
